Review_Text: I have read a couple of books on Warhol over the years, the one that sticks out and the author had a short piece in this doc is Holy Terror, Andy Warhol Close Up by Bob Colacello. He worked closely with Warhol for several years. This documentary shows that Andy was a really strange dude. They didn't really mention anything negative which doesn't give a viewer a true picture.Colacello mentioned that he Andy made people feel inspired and then used them, he sucked people dry.
